recipesJson.name: Glazed Angel Cream
recipesJson.author: Freshepies
recipesJson.description:
For Wendy Vapes DIY session.  All of the flavors can be used in other recipes quiet commonly.
A quick and easy Angel food cake!  Glazed strawberries is a stand alone flavor, one if the few strawberries capable of being so.  Angel cake is a fairly close representation of the actual thing, the coconut custard rounds it out nicely while providing some moisture and filling in with a light vanilla.  Whipped cream is whipped cream.
